response.answer_text: Average students means what…. In study or some other sense if you mean average student in study then you have to know that there is only one thing require to get selected in civil services is ones hardwork and dedication. UPSC want averege mind not Einstein because the work of a civil servant is social not researching new things.You can also find many people who didn't get IIT's /AIIMS as these are toughtest exam for engenrering /medical in INDIA then they decide for UPSC.There are almost 85-90% aspirant are average in there study only 10% are Einstein with mind.Last but not least there are many aspirant who hardly made tere 12th board but manage to get into civil services.At last if you are also an aspirant then you need not to have supermind but only thing is hardwork and consistent in your hardwork.All the best.!!!Edits are welcome.
